sentences: Jacques de la Presle (1888-1969) was a French composer.
He won Second Prix at the Prix de Rome in 1920 with his cantata Don Juan.
The following year he won the Grand Prix with a cantata Hermione, and departed to spend four years at the Villa MÃ©dicis 1922-1925.
De la Presle taught at the Paris Conservatory from 1937 to 1958.
